ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah has spread the earth out as a carpet for you
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God has made the earth for you a spreading,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah has made the earth a wide expanse for you
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God has spread out the earth
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: ‘And it is Allah Who made the earth a bed for you.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Allah has made for you the earth a wide expanse.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Allah has made for you the earth a wide expanse,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And God has laid the earth for you as a carpet,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Allah hath made the earth a wide expanse for you
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: how God has spread the earth out for you
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Allah hath made the earth Unto you an expanse.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Allah has made the earth a vast expanse for you
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And Allah has made the earth for you as a carpet (spread out),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Allah has made for you the earth wide spread (an expanse).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah has made the earth spread out for you
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And God made the earth a spread for you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Allah has made for you the earth an expanse
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [71:19] And God has made the earth a flat [open] expanse for you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And Allah hath made the earth a wide expanse for you) to lay and sleep on
